forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 61F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
